summary:

   "summary": ... 
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Class name DescopeOAuthProvider. Likely provides OAuth integration with Descope service. It holds token and user info. So summary: class that handles OAuth authentication with Descope, managing access token retrieval and user profile fetching. Business intent: enable applications to authenticate users via Descope OAuth, abstract token handling and user info retrieval. Keywords: OAuth, authentication, token management, user profile, Descope, provider, access token, user info, integration.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. So avoid "get_token" etc. Use generic terms. Provide JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "A provider component that encapsulates the OAuth workflow for the Descope service, handling acquisition of access credentials and retrieval of the authenticated user's profile data.",
  "business_intent": "To simplify integration of Descope's OAuth authentication into applications by managing token lifecycle and exposing user identity information in a unified interface.",
  "keywords": [
    "OAuth",
    "authentication",
    "Descope",
    "access token",
    "user profile",
    "credential management",
    "identity provider",
    "integration",
    "security"
  ]
}
